sentences.english: Shennongjia is a famous national scenic spot.
sentences.chinese: 神农架是全国著名的风景名胜。

sentences.english: Among them, thd sighting on wild, ape-like creatures add to its mysterious sense.
sentences.chinese: 其中，野人之谜的传说更给神农架增添了神秘的色彩。

sentences.english: The whole family are going to skate in ShenLongjia.
sentences.chinese: 全家人都将去神农架滑冰。

sentences.english: The Shennong Stream is indeed a very attractive scenic spot.
sentences.chinese: 神农溪是一个充满魅力的旅游风景点。

sentences.english: Shen Nong put it in the bag on the right.
sentences.chinese: 神农将它放进右边袋子里。

sentences.english: Legend goes that Shennong discovered the medical effect of the tea by chance.
sentences.chinese: 传说神农在偶然的情况下发现了茶的药用功效。

sentences.english: Emperor Yan Shennong found tea leaf can be used to deal with poisons.
sentences.chinese: 据说炎帝神农发现茶叶可以用来解毒。

sentences.english: Plants of Hemerocallis esculenta in Shennongjia mount in northwestern Hubei have long been identified as H. fulva in the literature.
sentences.chinese: 产自鄂西北神农架的北萱草植物一直被误定为萱草。

sentences.english: When divine farming cultivates food crops , I did not eat fireworks to feed already.
sentences.chinese: 神农种植五谷时，我早已不吃烟火食了。

sentences.english: Shennong which the original group of millet, rice beds to the South.
sentences.chinese: 其中神农族原来种小米，到了南方改种水稻。

sentences.english: Later, we went to Shennong Zoology Park.
sentences.chinese: 随后，我们来到了神农生态园。

sentences.english: According to a Chinese ancient legend , Shen Nong discovered tea.
sentences.chinese: 根据一个中国古代的传说，神农氏发现了茶叶。

sentences.english: Notes on soil dematiaceous hyphomycetes from Shennongjia Natural Conservation Area, Hubei Province I.
sentences.chinese: 湖北神农架自然保护区土壤中的暗色丝孢菌I。

sentences.english: Don't you forget that Shennong, the Yan Emperor, was the chief of the ancient Qiang tribesmen.
sentences.chinese: 你忘了，这炎帝神农氏是古时候羌族的首领。

sentences.english: Laojunshan Shennongjia in the north-east peak.
sentences.chinese: 老君山在神农架主峰东北。

sentences.english: The custom of gift-giving on Christmas began with the Roman festivals of Saturnalia and Kalends .
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节赠送礼物的风俗起源于罗马的神农节和朔日节。

the Yellow Emperor, mythological emperor of China, reigned c. 2697-2597 BC

alternative name for the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝
the distant past/ancient times/antiquity/early historical times
Suirenshi, legendary inventor of fire

Five Legendary Emperors, usually taken to be the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4] and four of his sons Zhuan Xu 顓頊|颛顼[Zhuan1 Xu1], Di Ku 帝嚳|帝喾[Di4 Ku4], Tang Yao 唐堯|唐尧[Tang2 Yao2], Yu Shun 虞舜[Yu2 Shun4]
Yu the Great (c. 21st century BC) mythical leader who tamed the floods
